doc.title: A Triumphant Tale
doc.plot: Jeff from Tatura Hot Bread and John from Bayswater Cake Kitchen have both won 'The Great Australian Vanilla Slice Triumph' competition in previous years. Entrants know all too well the benefits that come from winning this competition. Together with the bragging rights of 'Australia's best Vanilla Slice' comes increased exposure, increased business and increased profits. Join Jeff and John as they take different approaches to this year's competition. Allowing insights into the previous 'closed door' of baking secrets and sharing their thoughts on the competition and its position within the baking industry they submit their pastries and wait to see who is rightfully crowned Triumphant.
